title: Hampshire
summary: Hampshire (/ˈhæmpʃər/, /-ʃɪər/ (listen); abbreviated to Hants)[lower-alpha 1] is a county in South East England on the coast of the English Channel. The county town is Winchester, but the county is named after Southampton. Its two largest cities are Southampton and Portsmouth which are administered separately as unitary authorities; the rest of the county is governed by a combination of Hampshire County Council and non-metropolitan borough councils.
